group_1.narration: "Thank you for that wonderful studio performance!@Give a round of applause for Urara and Kurara,@the street performance duo from Yukuni City!"
"Thank you sooo much for having us!"

group_1.textLeft: It seems like life is back to normal around here.

group_1.textRight: It feels a little lonely.

group_1.textLeft: It’s not often that we have so many visitors, @after all.

group_1.narration: "Next up, a testimonial from a child who survived @the recent elementary school shooting."

"According to the witness testimony, @the assailant forced the class to choose@ a fellow student to be their "sacrifice".@There is a call for all the children involved @to undergo psychological counseling.@What do the commentators think of this?"
"I can’t believe they actually picked someone…@I wonder what the students who voted@for that poor girl were thinking.@Is there evidence that she was being bullied?"
"No, no. These kids have been through enough. @It would just be cruel and harmful @to make them explain their reasoning."

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, I remember that incident… @What a terrible loss…

group_1.textRight: Those kids are in elementary school @just like me. Scary…
There’ve been lots of disturbing incidents lately…

group_1.narration: "Up next is the interview @from Satomi Medical Center’s director @regarding the psychological treatment @for these traumatized children."

group_1.textRight: Oh, that’s Touka’s father!

group_1.textLeft: Are you both going to visit her @at the hospital today?

group_1.textRight: Yes, we’ll stop by after school, so we might @be home a little late.

group_1.textLeft: I understand, take care of yourselves.
Touka and Nemu, yeah…? @Be sure to say hello for me.

group_1.textRight: I will!
(Speaking of which… I should bring them a gift.)

group_1.textLeft: Good morning, Rena. @Sorry I couldn’t walk with you this morning.
I had some chores to finish at the villa…

group_1.textRight: Ah, morning… Don’t worry about it.

group_1.textLeft: …Is something wrong, Rena?

group_1.textRight: No… I was thinking about something people @were talking about…

group_1.textLeft: Huh? A rumor?

group_1.narration: "Hey, did you hear…? @A second year girl fell off the @roof of her apartment complex."
"They say it was an accident, @but I wonder if she’s okay… @I heard they took her away @in an ambulance last night."

group_1.textLeft: I didn’t know…

group_1.textRight: I guess she was a second year student @who lived at that apartment complex…
It’s kind of depressing to think about…

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… I hope she’s alright.
Oh, please excuse me…

group_1.textRight: …[wait:0.8][chara:302501:lipSynch_1]the roof…

group_1.textLeft: Huh…?

group_1.textRight: You okay, Iroha?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yeah…
(She’s already gone… @I wonder what was wrong…)

group_1.textRight: So you’re going home alone today. @You’re visiting some girls at the hospital?

group_1.textLeft: Um…Oh, yes, that’s right! I still need to find @a gift for them…

group_1.textRight: Well then, I know just the place for you.

group_1.narration: Rena told me about a girl named Konomi Haruna,@who recently started a Flower Arrangement Club.
Her dream is to open a flower shop,@and she holds flower arrangement @lessons during lunchtime.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, now it’s all done! @May your thoughts reach your loved ones.

group_1.textRight: This will make them so happy…! @Thank you very much!

group_1.narration: Ui and I took the small bouquet with us @and went to visit Touka and Nemu.

group_1.textLeft: It’s Ui and Big Sis! I’ve been waiting for you!

group_1.textRight: Being stuck alone with Touka is pretty draining.

group_1.textLeft: Wha- Hey!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I’m glad you two are feeling better.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, my condition has stabilized recently.@I feel like I could get up and run at any moment.
[chara:100702:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]If you really tried to run, you’d run straight @to the ICU!

group_1.textRight: Hey, that was a mean joke.
I’m going to put these flowers in a vase.@Sis made the bouquet herself!

group_1.textLeft: Really?! It’s so cute! I’m so happy to have them!
Yes, it would be a shame to let them wither away.

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* I’m glad you like them so much.
Oh, and Yachiyo says hello to both of you.

group_1.textLeft: Is Yachiyo the caretaker of the place @you’re staying right now?
It seems nice, I want to live there with you, too!
Yeah…But we’ll have to focus @on getting better first.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we’ll be waiting for you.
Yep, but don’t overdo it!
I’m glad they’re doing well.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, me too.

group_1.textRight: Mito…please calm down… @Even if you scream, nothing’s going to change…

group_1.textLeft: Because…Because we were with her @just yesterday… She was happy!
She was still breathing when Seika called the ambulance, wasn’t she?!

group_1.textRight: …It’s hard to accept… @But that’s what…the doctor said.

group_1.textLeft: …No way…no…It can't be… @I refuse to believe that Leila is dead!
I don’t want that…
(Those girls have the same uniform as me…@I’ve seen them at school before…)
(I wonder if one of them…passed away…)

group_1.narration: "Hey, did you hear…? @A second year girl fell off the @roof of her apartment complex."
"They say it was an accident, @but I wonder if she’s okay… @I heard they took her away @in an ambulance last night."

group_1.textLeft: (Oh no…their friend must’ve been the girl @people were talking about at school.)
